<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_csm_case_types.CSMCaseTypeConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CSMCaseTypeConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSMCaseTypeConstants = Class.create();
CSMCaseTypeConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'CSMCaseTypeConstants'
};

CSMCaseTypeConstants.OOB_SD_EXTENSION_POINT = 'CSMServiceDefinitionIntegrations';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.INTERACTION_TABLE = 'interaction';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_BL_INTERNAL_TABLE = 'sn_csm_business_location_internal';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_BL_EXTERNAL_TABLE = 'sn_csm_business_location_external';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_SERVICE_ORGANIZATION_TABLE = 'sn_customer_service_organization';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.SOLD_PRODUCT_TABLE = 'sn_install_base_sold_product';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.INSTALL_BASE_TABLE = 'sn_install_base_item';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_SERVICE_TYPE_PRESALE = '1';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_SERVICE_TYPE_POSTSALE = '2';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.CSM_SERVICE_TYPE_GENERAL = '3';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.PRODUCT_SERVICE_ITEMS_COUNT = gs.getProperty("sn_csm_case_types.service_definition_select_count", 25);
CSMCaseTypeConstants.MAX_PULL_SERVICE_COUNT = 300;
CSMCaseTypeConstants.MAX_DISPLAY_SERVICE_COUNT = 200;
CSMCaseTypeConstants.TABLE_TYPE = 'sn_customerservice_case';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.TASK_TABLE_TYPE = 'sn_customerservice_task';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.SERVICE_TO_SERVICE_REL_TABLE = 'sn_csm_case_types_service_to_service_rel';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.SERVICE_DEFINITION = 'sn_case_type_selection';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.SERVICE_CATEGORY = 'sn_csm_case_types_service_category';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.SERVICE_CATEGORY_RELATIONSHIP = 'sn_csm_case_types_service_category_rel';
CSMCaseTypeConstants.PRODUCT_SERVICE_RELATIONSHIP = 'sn_csm_case_types_product_service_rel';
// For "Complex API output" ( Install Base Item and Sold Product info for a Product), we will set isSimpleOutput false.
CSMCaseTypeConstants.IS_SIMPLE_OUTPUT = false;

CSMCaseTypeConstants.SOLD_PRODUCT = gs.getMessage("Sold Product");
CSMCaseTypeConstants.INSTALL_BASE = gs.getMessage("Install Base");

CSMCaseTypeConstants.ACTION_LOCATION = {
    FORM: 'form',
    LIST: 'list'
};
CSMCaseTypeConstants.ACTION_TYPE = {
    SERVICE: 'service',
    RELATED_SERVICE: 'relatedService'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-25 05:03:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>65902051736511109edbc1f52ff6a791</sys_id>

        <sys_package display_value="CSM Case Types" source="sn_csm_case_types">8ba29585872633003c1c8467a7cb0be4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="CSM Case Types">8ba29585872633003c1c8467a7cb0be4</sys_scope>

        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-15 16:58:17</sys_updated_on>

</record_update>
